Demo Gallery¶

This Demo Gallery provide some Python scripts where you see how to implment specific Phase Field models step by step using FEniCS and mocafe.

Also, a brief introduction to the FEniCS platform is provided.

Just click on the demo you’d like to see:

Download all examples in Python source code: demo_doc_python.zip

Download all examples in Jupyter notebooks: demo_doc_jupyter.zip

Gallery generated by Sphinx-Gallery
